section.title: Submitting and Reviewing a Job
section.para: To submit a Job you must create a Job description. This is an XML file containing the tasks you want to run, as well as special environment variables and other options you want to setup for your Job.

note.title: Valid Job Specs
note.para: If this is the first time running this Job make sure that at least one system with the specified architecture has access to the specified distro and all the relevant tasks are available to Beaker. To do this, See , and respectively

section.para: To submit the Job, either use the beaker client or submit the Job via the web app
Once Submitted you can view the progress of the Job by going to the Job search page .Once your Job is Completed, see the Job results page .
